error403.title: Access Forbidden
error403.subtitle: You don't have permission to access this page
error403.description: Sorry, you don't have the required permissions to view this content. Please contact your administrator for access.

suggestions.title: You can:
suggestions.item1: Check if you're logged in with the correct account
suggestions.item2: Contact your administrator for access permissions
suggestions.item3: Go back to the previous page

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.subtitle: Learn about our refund process and wallet withdrawal instructions

overview.title: Refund Overview
overview.content: We are committed to providing users with quality service experience. If you are not satisfied with the purchased service, you can apply for a refund according to our refund policy. Refunds will be returned to your account as wallet balance.

refundProcess.title: Refund Process
refundProcess.content: When your refund request is approved, the refund amount will be immediately returned to your account wallet balance. You can use the wallet balance to continue purchasing our services or apply for withdrawal to your cryptocurrency wallet address.

walletBalance.title: Wallet Balance Description
walletBalance.content: Wallet balance is your virtual account balance on the Kaitu platform, which can be used for: 1. Purchasing or renewing any subscription plans; 2. Withdrawing to supported cryptocurrency wallets. Refunded wallet balance is immediately available, no waiting required.

withdrawalMethods.title: Withdrawal Methods
withdrawalMethods.content: We support withdrawing wallet balance to mainstream cryptocurrency wallets. Supported cryptocurrencies include:

supportedCryptos.title: Supported Cryptocurrencies
supportedCryptos.usdt: USDT (Tether) - Supports TRC20 and ERC20 networks
supportedCryptos.other: Other mainstream stablecoins and cryptocurrencies (please contact customer service for confirmation)

withdrawalProcess.title: Withdrawal Process
withdrawalProcess.step1: 1. Apply for withdrawal on the account page
withdrawalProcess.step2: 2. Select cryptocurrency type and blockchain network
withdrawalProcess.step5: 5. Submit application and wait for review
withdrawalProcess.step6: 6. Credited within 1-3 business days after approval

importantNotes.title: Important Notes
importantNotes.note1: • Please ensure the wallet address and blockchain network are correct
importantNotes.note2: • Funds lost due to incorrect wallet address are the user's responsibility
importantNotes.note3: • Withdrawal fees may vary for different cryptocurrencies and networks
importantNotes.note4: • Withdrawal requests cannot be canceled once submitted, please proceed with caution
importantNotes.note5: • First-time withdrawal may require identity verification
importantNotes.note6: • Large withdrawals may require additional security review

withdrawalFees.title: Withdrawal Fees
withdrawalFees.content: Withdrawal fees vary depending on the cryptocurrency and blockchain network. Specific fees will be displayed when you apply for withdrawal. We try to select networks with lower fees to process your withdrawal.

processingTime.title: Processing Time
processingTime.content: Withdrawal requests will be processed within 1-3 business days. Actual arrival time depends on blockchain network confirmation speed. During peak times or network congestion, arrival time may be extended.

refundPolicy.title: Refund Conditions
refundPolicy.content: Refund requests must meet the following conditions: service period not exceeding 7 days, no excessive traffic usage, normal account status, etc. For specific refund conditions, please refer to the terms of service or contact customer service.

contact.title: Contact Customer Service
contact.content: If you have any questions about refunds or withdrawals, please feel free to contact our customer service team: support@kaitu.io
